text:
[Verse]
Woke up to sunshine
A breeze is blowin' warm
Birds are singin' fine
Our day has just begun

[Verse 2]
Got no worries here
Laughter fills the air
Friends and good
Cold cheer
We don't have a care

[Chorus]
It's a sunny day
Let's run and play
In the rays of May
Let's dance away

[Verse]
Grass under our feet
Smiles that light the sky
Every face we meet
Feels like we could fly

[Verse 2]
Footprints in the sand
Glistening in the light
Hold my heart
Your hand
Stars come out tonight

[Chorus]
It's a sunny day
Let's run and play
In the rays of May
Let's dance away
title: Sunny Day Dreams
